name: Specter Slammer [Created for: KO Slam Jam]
name_original: Specter Slammer [Created for: KO Slam Jam]
description:
Created for KO!! Slam Jam January '23!

This is a game about defeating ghosts that are possesing people!

You arrive at your friends farm to find it's been overrun by ghosts! Use your Specter Slammer to whack the ghosts right out of them!

Mouse controls

Hit the ghosts before the time runs out

Themes included:

Slam (You're hitting the ghosts)

120 seconds (each level is 40 seconds for a total of 120)

Transition (You are transforming the ghosts back into people)

Artistic (Made all the LOVELY pixel art myself in paint, also made the sound effects. All curtesy of myself, can you tell?)

Optimistic (curing the farm of ghosts is optimistic)

Zing (Listen for when you miss a ghost, you might notice a thunder sound effect!)
